abstract.text: Structure containing the methods related to the user’s library.
Fetch the recently played resources for the user.
Fetch the resources in heavy rotation for the user.
Get the rating for an album in the user’s library.

Get the ratings for albums in the user’s library.
Add multiple songs to the user’s library by using their identifiers.
Search the user’s library by using a query.
Adds a rating for a playlist in the user’s library.
Fetch multiple artists from the user’s library by using their identifiers.

Fetch the recently played playlists for the user.

Get the ratings for songs in the user’s library.
